auth_not_valid: The authentication policy needs more steps: please contact your administrator for more information
cant_login: Can not do the login now
credentials_not_valid: Credentials are not valid, please check data and try again
offline: You are currently offline, please check your internet connection
server_not_responding: The server is not responding. Please contact your server administator
trust_device_and_ip: Trust this device and IP address
unsupported_version: The server sent a not valid response. Please contact your server administrator
wrong_password: Wrong password, please check data and try again
